oai_dc:dc.dc:title: View of the State Capitol Looking West, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a view of the State Capitol building, the John Sevier State Office Building, and the Cordell Hull State Office Building, looking west over rooftops, c.1950s. The Bijou Theater is also visible. The area was part of the Captiol Hill Redevelopment Project. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); Bijou Theatre (Nashville, Tenn.); Cordell Hull State Office Building (Nashville, Tenn.); John Sevier State Office Building (Nashville, Tenn.);
